mapper.select: SELECT donation_plan_no FROM donation_plan WHERE donator_id=#{donatorId} ORDER BY donation_plan_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT dp.donation_plan_no ,dp.donation_plan_title ,f.file_name ,f.file_ext FROM donation_plan AS dp JOIN file AS f ON dp.donation_plan_no = f.file_table_no WHERE f.file_ext IN('jpg','png','jpeg') ORDER BY f.file_date DESC

SELECT dp.donation_plan_no ,dp.donation_plan_title ,dp.donation_plan_content ,f.file_name ,f.file_ext FROM donation_plan AS dp JOIN file AS f ON dp.donation_plan_no = f.file_table_no WHERE f.file_ext IN('jpg','png','jpeg') AND dp.donation_plan_no=#{donationPlanNo}
SELECT d.donator_name ,dp.donation_plan_title ,dp.donation_plan_no ,LEFT(dp.donation_plan_date,10) AS donation_plan_date FROM donator AS d JOIN donation_plan AS dp ON d.donator_id=dp.donator_id

SELECT donator_id AS donatorId ,donation_plan_file_no AS donationPlanFileNo ,donation_plan_purpose AS donationPlanPurpose ,donation_plan_use_term AS donationPlanUseTerm ,donation_plan_goal_price AS donationPlanGoalPrice ,donation_plan_date AS donationPlanDate FROM donation_plan WHERE donation_plan_no=#{donationPlanNo}
